programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When a teenage sex worker disappears, Rollins and Velasco find a key clue in a pile of neglected missing persons reports.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Carisi asks the SVU for help with a murder investigation when one of the witnesses shows signs of abuse.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Carisi tries Richard Wheatley for the murder of Kathy Stabler; Benson finds herself at odds with a friend when Barba agrees to take the case.

programme.title: Resident Alien
programme.desc: Harry struggles to find balance with his new human form.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The death of a boy and his abusive guardian leads the detectives to a travel agency specializing in exotic trips for sexual predators.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A 15-year-old rape victim steps off of a subway platform, and two suspects in the case admit to being sexually involved with the girl's mother.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A drug dealer dies in jail after being beaten and sexually assaulted.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When an 8-year-old beauty queen's body is found in a suitcase on a Manhattan bus, detectives hunt for a pedophile with a fetish for pageants.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: When a California housewife is murdered in broad daylight, the suspected killer claims it was a burglary gone awry.

programme.title: Dateline
programme.desc: When a California housewife is murdered in broad daylight, the suspected killer claims it was a burglary gone awry.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: When Hetty turns in retirement papers and disappears, Shay Mosley comes to Los Angeles to oversee the team and makes staffing changes; Sam insists that Callen find a new partner.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: When the daughter of a notorious counterfeiter arrives in Los Angeles, Sam goes under cover as a financier; Callen partners with Anna to track the family's latest scheme.

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: During the murder investigation of a Navy Lieutenant on leave in Los Angeles, the team uncovers classified surveillance briefs she smuggled into the city that may have been sold to a foreign buyer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Alexandra Cabot questions a pediatrician (Judd Hirsch) about a dead baby found in a cooler in the East River.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Stabler hunts for a missing 14-year-old girl who may have been abducted by a foreign child pornographer.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives Benson and Stabler look for a killer with a foot fetish.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A young boy witnesses the brutal sexual assault and murder of his mother.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A man (Fred Savage) accused of rape becomes a formidable opponent when he decides to handle his own defense.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Evidence points to an angry ex-boyfriend when a cocktail waitress is murdered outside a popular nightspot.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives suspect several young socialites of raping a girl at a Manhattan nightclub, then killing her.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Detectives face off against a Colombian cartel and the Drug Enforcement Administration while investigating the brutal rape and murder of an undercover agent.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A young woman learning about her birth parents asks Benson for help; Carisi and Rollins weigh the risks of taking their relationship public.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The creator of a dating app is accused of using it to rape women; Velasco's experience as an SVU detective is put on trial.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Velasco asks Benson for help finding three girls who were trafficked from his hometown to New York City.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Garland asks Benson to reopen a missing persons case he worked as a rookie officer; a victim in one of Carisi's recent cases is arrested.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When the only evidence in a crime is a church confession, Carisi must find another way to prove his suspect guilty; Benson agrees to meet with an old friend seeking to make amends for past transgressions.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The SVU provides help and protection for a longtime domestic violence victim, but when she winds up at the defendant's table in court, Rollins surprises Carisi with a formidable opponent at trial.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A girl is shot and Cosgrove teams with Detective Jalen Shaw to track down her killer; Benson and Stabler assist and realize it's more than a typical homicide; McCoy and Price seek justice against an international crime ring; part 2 of 3.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: A group of teens terrorizing tourists has the SVU squad working overtime; McGrath teams them up with the Bronx gang unit to track down a crucial lead.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: A series of brutal home invasion robberies finds the team paired with Detective Borkowski, an old friend of Ruzek's, to work the case; things get complicated for Torres when it becomes clear Borkowski has a vastly different policing style.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: A shocking ambush at a funeral leads the team into a heated investigation to find the shooters; much to Atwater's surprise, he must rely on someone from his past to help in the investigation, dredging up old memories and revealing new truths.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Sean O'Neal surprises Upton with a call from prison, revealing sensitive information; while Upton grapples with how to keep O'Neal at a distance, the team quickly mobilizes to stop a crime in progress before it's too late.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Voight and the team help ASA Nina Chapman pursue a drug runner who dodged prison years ago after Chapman's informant mysteriously disappeared; the investigation takes a turn when Voight uncovers a damaging secret from Chapman's past.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: After a brutal shooting, Burgess and Ruzek find themselves trapped aboard the busy "L" subway; as they piece together scant evidence, the team is drawn into a dark family drama; Burgess' proximity to the shooting triggers harsh memories.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: When a family is poisoned in their home, the team discovers a connection to the Becks; Ruzek goes undercover to work for their business, and as he gets closer to Samantha, chilling information about her father, Richard, comes to light.

programme.title: Chicago P.D.
programme.desc: Voight takes the stand in a high-stakes murder trial against notorious drug kingpin Arturo Morales; when it becomes clear that Morales and his henchmen have compromised a juror, Voight and the team work furiously to ensure justice prevails.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: An annoying floater takes a romantic interest in Violet; Ritter catches a local politician in a compromising position; Mouch and Severide help Trudy with an arson investigation.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Kidd, Seager and Carver investigate a fire at the city stables; Kylie clashes with some of the firefighters over changes due to budget cuts; Herrmann struggles to keep it together as Cindy's condition worsens.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Cruz feels the burden of his increased responsibilities; Kidd, Gallo and Carver get caught in the middle of a gang war on a call; Herrmann wrangles Trudy for help lifting Cindy's mood.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Mouch builds a classic firetruck model for the Deputy District Chief but needs assistance from Gallo and Ritter; Brett and Violet encounter multiple victims with a strange set of symptoms; Cindy's chemotherapy results loom over the Herrmann family.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: A familiar face returns to Firehouse 51 to serve with Kidd on a special task force; with Tony close to breaking the CFD's perfect attendance record, Mouch and Capp work to keep him safe; old grudges resurface when Gallo reunites with a family member.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Boden, Ritter, Herrmann and Kidd work together to take down a local politician responsible for a chemical fire; after his aunt's accident, Gallo worries about their future; Brett steps in to perform Dylan's magic show when he's out of town.

programme.title: Chicago Fire
programme.desc: Herrmann works on becoming a better man after Cindy's cancer journey; Kidd bonds with a homeless victim on a call; Kylie takes her firefighter exams; a harrowing call takes a toll on Brett.

programme.title: Ticket to Paradise
programme.desc: A man and his ex-wife race to Bali, Indonesia, to stop their daughter from marrying a seaweed farmer. As they desperately try to sabotage the wedding, the bickering duo soon find themselves rekindling old feelings that once made them happy together.

programme.title: UCI World Cup Mountain Biking
programme.desc: Women's UCI Mountain Bike World Series action from the DHI Elite Final in La Thuile, Italy.

programme.title: UCI World Cup Mountain Biking
programme.desc: Men's UCI Mountain Bike World Series action from the DHI Elite Final in La Thuile, Italy.

programme.title: Ally's Social Club
programme.desc: Ally McCoist interviews legendary football manager Sir Alex Ferguson about his life and career.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the second leg of the 2003/04 UEFA Champions League quarter-final between Deportivo La Coruna and AC Milan at the Riazor Stadium. Milan led 4-0 from the first leg.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the 2004/05 UEFA Champions League group stage tie between Manchester United and Fenerbahce at Old Trafford. The match saw Wayne Rooney make his highly anticipated debut.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the last 16 second leg from the 2004/05 UEFA Champions League between Chelsea and Barcelona at Stamford Bridge. Barca were in the driving seat after a 2-1 first leg win.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: We revisit this 2005/06 UEFA Champions League group stage epic at Ibrox between Rangers and 2004 champions Porto. A tough group also included Inter Milan and Artmedia Bratislava.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: A look back at this enthralling 2006/07 UEFA Champions League group stage clash between Manchester United and Gordon Strachan's Celtic at Old Trafford.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League Classics
programme.desc: We revisit the quarter-final second leg from the 2006/07 UEFA Champions League at Old Trafford between Manchester United and Roma. United had to overturn a 2-1 first leg deficit.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Brighton welcome Wolves to American Express Stadium. Brighton have won their last four league games against Wolves.

programme.title: UEFA Champions League: Stories of the Finals
programme.desc: Take a look back at the 2007 UEFA Champions League final between AC Milan and Liverpool. The Italian side got their revenge for the Miracle of Istanbul two years earlier.

programme.title: One-Day International Cricket
programme.desc: Sri Lanka seek to continue their impressive white ball home form as they face Bangladesh in the first of three ODIs at R Premadasa International Stadium in Colombo.

programme.title: One-Day International Cricket
programme.desc: Action from the second One Day International between Sri Lanka and Bangladesh at R Premadasa International Stadium in Colombo. The Lions hold a 1-0 lead in the series.

programme.title: Live: One-Day International Cricket
programme.desc: Cricket action from the third One Day International between Sri Lanka and Bangladesh at R Premadasa International Stadium.

programme.title: FIA European Rally Championship Highlights
programme.desc: Highlights from Rally Rome, part of the 2025 European Rally Championship.

programme.title: Major League Baseball
programme.desc: Highlights from Major League Baseball.

programme.title: FA Disability Cup
programme.desc: Highlights of all the best action from the 2025 FA Disability Cup at St. George's Park, as six finals were played over one weekend.

programme.title: Premier League Goals of the Season
programme.desc: Revisit the best goals from the 2018/19 season. Three players shared the Golden Boot after Pierre Emerick-Aubameyang equalled Liverpool duo Mo Salah and Sadio Mane as top scorers.

programme.title: Wimbledon 2025
programme.desc: Action from Wimbledon, the third of the four tennis Grand Slams each year.

programme.title: Test Cricket
programme.desc: Action from day five of the second Test between West Indies and Australia at National Cricket Stadium in Grenada.

programme.title: Giro d'Italia Women
programme.desc: Stage three of the 2025 Giro d'Italia Women, as the peloton travels 122km from Vezza d'Oglio to the city of Trento.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded
programme.desc: A look back at UFC 62 from 2006 in Las Vegas, featuring the thrilling headline light heavyweight bout between Chuck Liddell and Renato Sobral.

programme.title: UFC Connected
programme.desc: UFC Connected brings fans a unique look inside the UFC with exclusive access to fighters, teams and events from around the globe.

programme.title: Wimbledon 2025
programme.desc: Action from Wimbledon, the third of the four tennis Grand Slams each year.

programme.title: Ally's Social Club
programme.desc: Ally McCoist is joined by Newcastle United legend and the Premier League's all-time leading goalscorer, Alan Shearer.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Aston Villa face Newcastle United at Villa Park. The Villans are unbeaten in their last six Premier League home games against the Magpies.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Nottingham Forest host Arsenal at City Ground. Forest have won their last three home games against Arsenal in all competitions.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Liverpool welcome Chelsea to Anfield. Jurgen Klopp is looking for his 200th Premier League win in charge of the Reds.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Tottenham host Brentford at Tottenham Hotspur Stadium. Spurs have lost just one of their last nine league games against Brentford.

programme.title: Premier League
programme.desc: Action from the Premier League as Manchester City take on Burnley at Etihad Stadium. Burnley are winless in 16 top-flight away games against Man City.

programme.title: Sign Up: Into Football
programme.desc: Watch our favourite interviews and moments from last season, all featuring British Sign Language and subtitles. Guests include Arne Slot, Phil Foden, John McGinn and Eberechi Eze.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: AFL action between St Kilda and Hawthorn at Marvel Stadium. The Hawks have not lost at this venue for almost two years.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League as Sydney Swans face Fremantle at the SCG. Can the Dockers extend their winning streak to seven games?

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League as Adelaide Crows take on Melbourne at Adelaide Oval. Can the Crows continue their push for a first finals appearance in eight seasons?

programme.title: Giro d'Italia Women
programme.desc: Stage four of the 2026 Giro d'Italia Women sees the riders tackle a tough 142km mountain route from Castello Tesino to the town of Pianezze.

programme.title: Tour de France Cycling
programme.desc: Highlights from stage five and the first individual time trial of the 2025 Tour de France, as the riders tackle a 33km chrono race in the historic port city of Caen.

programme.title: Brussels Urban Sessions
programme.desc: Action from Men's Freestyle final, part of the BMX Urban Sessions in Brussels.

programme.title: The Gruppetto
programme.desc: We review the opening weekend of the Tour de France and opening stage of the Giro D'Italia Women's races.

programme.title: UFC Connected

programme.title: UFC Reloaded
programme.desc: We revisit UFC 218, one of the most exciting cards of 2017, as Max Holloway successfully defended his featherweight belt against Jose Aldo in the main event in Detroit.

programme.title: Fishing: On the Bank
programme.desc: Angling magazine show presented by Rob Hughes and Andy Ford, featuring the 2025 Sea Angling Classic.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Inter look to get their Serie A title challenge back on track as they host Patrick Vieira's Genoa at San Siro. Nerazzurri are unbeaten in their last 11 league games against Genoa.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Juventus return to Serie A action as they travel to face Cagliari at Unipol Domus. How will Juve respond after their disappointing UEFA Champions League exit?

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Serie A action as Napoli host Inter at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona. Can the champions stop Inter's title charge, or will the Nerazzurri dominate in Naples?

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Serie A action from San Siro as AC Milan face Lazio. Can the Rossoneri secure a crucial win, or will Lazio stun them in Milan?

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Serie A clash as Lazio host Udinese at Stadio Olimpico. Can Lazio continue their push for Europe, or will Udinese cause an upset in Rome?

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Serie A action as Juventus take on Atalanta at the Allianz Stadium. A crucial battle for the top four-can Juve assert dominance, or will Atalanta strike in Turin?

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Serie A showdown as Fiorentina host Juventus at the Stadio Artemio Franchi. Can Fiorentina rise to the challenge, or will Juve take control in Florence?

programme.title: Major League Baseball
programme.desc: Highlights from Major League Baseball.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: AFL action as West Coast Eagles take on GWS Giants at Optus Stadium. Can finals hopefuls the Giants avoid a slip up against the bottom-placed Eagles?

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League as Essendon face Gold Coast Suns at Marvel Stadium. Can the injury-hit Bombers put a dent in the Suns' top-eight push?

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League as Geelong Cats take on Richmond at GMHBA Stadium. The Tigers have not won on the Cats' home deck since 2006.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: AFL action as Brisbane Lions and Port Adelaide face-off at the Gabba. Can the Lions avoid an upset against the resurgent Power?

programme.title: WNBA Basketball
programme.desc: Action from the Women's National Basketball Association as Seattle Storm travel to face New York Liberty at the Barclays Center. The Storm beat Liberty 89-79 back in June.

programme.title: Global Champions Tour
programme.desc: Coverage of the Longines Global Champions Tour and the 2025 Grand Prix of Monaco, as the best riders in the world compete in a breathtaking waterfront setting.

programme.title: Fishing: On the Bank
programme.desc: Angling magazine show presented by Rob Hughes and Andy Ford, featuring the 2025 Sea Angling Classic.

programme.title: Ultra-Trail World Series
programme.desc: UTMB World Series highlights from the 2025 Salzburg Ultra Trail, taking participants through beautiful Austrian scenery and ending in the world-famous city of Mozart.

programme.title: Australian Rules
programme.desc: AFL action as West Coast Eagles take on GWS Giants at Optus Stadium. Can finals hopefuls the Giants avoid a slip up against the bottom-placed Eagles?

programme.desc: Action from the Australian Football League as Essendon face Gold Coast Suns at Marvel Stadium. Can the injury-hit Bombers put a dent in the Suns' top-eight push?

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Serie A clash as Atalanta face Inter at the Gewiss Stadium. A key battle in the title race-can Atalanta stop Inter's momentum, or will the Nerazzurri prevail in Bergamo?

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Action from Serie A as Marco Baroni's Lazio face Paolo Vanoli's Torino at Stadio Olimpico. How will Lazio respond after their 5-0 defeat to Bologna last time out?

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Action from Serie A as title contenders Napoli host AC Milan at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona. Milan are unbeaten in each of their last six away matches against Napoli.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Serie A action as AC Milan take on Raffaele Palladino's Fiorentina at San Siro. The Viola could record a league double over Milan for the first time since 2000/01.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Serie A action as Roma face Juventus at Stadio Olimpico. Can the Giallorossi make it nine league wins in a row, or will Igor Tudor pick up back-to-back wins in charge of Juve?

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Serie A action from Derby della Capitale as Lazio and Roma battle it out at Stadio Olimpico. Roma could do the league double over Lazio for the first time since 2015/16.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Action from Serie A as Napoli face Empoli at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona. Antonio Conte's Napoli have won just two of their last nine league games.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Serie A action as Parma host Juventus at Stadio Ennio Tardini. The Ducali could avoid defeat in both league matches against the Bianconeri for the first time since 2010/11.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Action from Serie A as AC Milan host Atalanta at San Siro. Milan have lost two of their last three league games against the Black and Blues.

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: The Serie A title race continues to heat up as league leaders Inter host Roma at San Siro. Can Simone Inzaghi's side secure a big win to pile the pressure on Napoli?

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Serie A action as title contenders Napoli face Torino at Stadio Diego Armando Maradona. Can Antonio Conte's side take another huge step towards a fourth Scudetto?

programme.title: Serie A Football
programme.desc: Inter look to get their hunt for a 21st Scudetto back on track as they welcome Hellas Verona to San Siro. Verona have never won away against Inter in Serie A.
